snippet.title: Gray Dawn Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get the game: https://store.steampowered.com/app/747360/Gray_Dawn/

Step into the world of Gray Dawn and journey as a catholic priest between two worlds: 1920 England and the beautiful world of Romania inspired by Eastern Europe. 

Visit our website: http://gray-dawn.com/

Follow us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/GrayDawnGame
Join our exclusive FB group: https://bit.ly/2rffMM4
Send us a tweet at: https://twitter.com/StoneInteract
Watch our Instagram: https://bit.ly/2rYbKHY
